CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc IT Department?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc IT Department is arc {Admin and Facilities}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Admin and Facilities?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Admin and Facilities is arc {IT Department}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Admin and Facilities} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Sales Department} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Admin and Facilities to Sales Department in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Admin and Facilities to IT Department in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Sales Department to Admin and Facilities in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Sales Department and IT Department in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Sales Department and IT Department is {949}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Admin and Facilities and Sales Department in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Admin and Facilities and Sales Department is {33}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Admin and Facilities?
SC.A: The total flow output from Admin and Facilities is {1550}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by IT Department?
SC.A: The total flow input by IT Department is {646}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 987? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {1026} from {Admin and Facilities} to {Sales Department}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 77? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {33} from {Sales Department} to {Admin and Facilities}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 77 and 907? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {866} from {IT Department} to {Admin and Facilities}, a flow of {524} from {Admin and Facilities} to {IT Department}, a flow of {122} from {Sales Department} to {IT Department}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Sales Department to IT Department or from Sales Department to Admin and Facilities?
NC.A: The flow from {Sales Department} to {IT Department} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Sales Department to IT Department, from IT Department to Sales Department, or from Admin and Facilities to IT Department?
NC.A: The flow from {IT Department} to {Sales Department} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {IT Department}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Admin and Facilities} and {IT Department}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc IT Department, Arc Admin and Facilities, Arc Sales Department}.
